```{r}

#Exercise 1 

# install.packages("rbenchmark")
library(rbenchmark)

set.seed(666)
n=10
d = data.frame(matrix(rnorm(n * 10), ncol=10))
d$cat = sample(LETTERS[1:5], n, replace=TRUE)


benchmark(
  # 1) apply, 

  # 2) sapply
  sapply(d[1:n,1:10], max), #Sophie's part
  
  # 3) vapply, 

  # 4) single for loop:
  for(i in 1:nrow(d)) { print(max(d[i,1:10]))},

  # 5) double for loop:
  for(i in 1:nrow(d)) {
    maxval <- -Inf;   
    for(j in 1:(ncol(d)-1))
        { 
        if(d[i,j] > maxval) {
            maxval<-d[i,j]
        }
    } 
    print(maxval); },

replications=n,
order="relative"
)


```
